TextBlock.Text: SOLANUM: Hy, I saw your message, and I would gladly travel over to Procul to check out your discoveries.
SOLANUM: Your vision staff is incredible, I'm sure this other technology you found would be worthy of being shown at a festival!
SOLANUM: I do have to finish my pilgrimage to the Quantum Moon before visiting, and my father might be arriving back home as I return.
SOLANUM: I promise I will visit you after all I have mentioned, dear friend.
